excerpt.rendered: NGOs working in the field need qualified professionals who are able to respond effectively to humanitarian crises and assist vulnerable populations. Whether a recent graduate, experienced humanitarian, high school graduate or employee looking to change career, whatever your profile or plan, find a training course to suit you at Bioforce.
